001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.zeromq;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
005import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.Disposable;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.BehaviorProcessor;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.FlowableProcessor;
010import org.bitcoinj.core.Block;
011import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
012import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
013import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.BitcoinClient;
014import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.ChainTipPublisher;
015import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.ChainTipService;
016import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc.RxBitcoinClient;
017import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.RxBlockchainService;
018import org.consensusj.bitcoinj.util.BlockUtil;
019import org.consensusj.rx.jsonrpc.RxJsonRpcClient;
020import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
021
022import java.io.Closeable;
023import java.net.URI;
024import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
025import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
026import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
027import java.util.function.Supplier;
028
029/**
030 *  Add conversion to bitcoinj-types to {@code RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService}. Also
031 *  uses the JSON-RPC client to fetch an initial {@link Block} so subscribers don't
032 *  have to wait ~ten minutes for one.
033 */
034public class RxBitcoinZmqService extends RxBitcoinZmqBinaryService implements RxBlockchainService, ChainTipService, Closeable {
035
036    private final FlowableProcessor<ChainTip> flowableChainTip = BehaviorProcessor.create();
037    private final Disposable blockSubscription;
038
039    public RxBitcoinZmqService(Network network, URI rpcUri, String rpcUser, String rpcPassword) {
040        this(new RxBitcoinClient(network, rpcUri, rpcUser, rpcPassword));
041    }
042
043    public RxBitcoinZmqService(BitcoinClient client) {
044        super(client);
045        blockSubscription = Flowable.fromPublisher(blockPublisher())
046                .flatMap(this::activeChainTipFromBestBlockPublisher)
047                .distinctUntilChanged(ChainTip::getHash)
048                .subscribe(this::onNextChainTip, flowableChainTip::onError, flowableChainTip::onComplete);
049    }
050
051    @Override
052    public Publisher<Transaction> transactionPublisher() {
053        return Flowable.fromPublisher(transactionBinaryPublisher())
054                .map(bytes -> Transaction.read(ByteBuffer.wrap(bytes)));   // Deserialize to Transaction
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public Publisher<Sha256Hash> transactionHashPublisher() {
059        return Flowable.fromPublisher(transactionHashBinaryPublisher())
060                .map(Sha256Hash::wrap);            // Deserialize to Sha256Hash
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public Publisher<Block> blockPublisher() {
065        return Flowable.fromPublisher(blockBinaryPublisher())
066                .map(ByteBuffer::wrap)
067                .map(Block::read)  // Deserialize to bitcoinj Block
068                .startWith(defer(client::getBestBlock)); // Use JSON-RPC client to fetch an initial block
069    }
070    
071    @Override
072    public Publisher<Sha256Hash> blockHashPublisher() {
073        return Flowable.fromPublisher(blockHashBinaryPublisher())
074                .map(Sha256Hash::wrap);             // Deserialize to Sha256Hash
075    }
076
077    @Override
078    public Publisher<Integer> blockHeightPublisher() {
079        return Flowable.fromPublisher(chainTipPublisher())
080                .map(ChainTip::getHeight);          // Extract block height
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public ChainTipPublisher chainTipPublisher() {
085        return ChainTipPublisher.of(flowableChainTip);
086    }
087
088    @Override
089    public void close()  {
090        super.close();
091        blockSubscription.dispose();
092    }
093
094    /**
095     * Return a <i>cold</i> {@link Single} for calling a provided <b>asynchronous</b> JSON-RPC method.
096     * (Uses a supplier to make sure the async call isn't made until subscription time)
097     * <p>
098     *  A  <i>cold</i> stream does not begin processing until someone subscribes to it.
099     * @param supplier of completable
100     * @param <RSLT> The type of the expected result
101     * @return A <i>cold</i> {@link Single} for calling the method.
102     */
103    private <RSLT> Single<RSLT> defer(Supplier<CompletionStage<RSLT>> supplier) {
104        return Single.defer(() -> Single.fromCompletionStage(supplier.get()));
105    }
106
107    private Publisher<ChainTip> activeChainTipFromBestBlockPublisher(Block block) {
108        return Flowable.defer(() -> Flowable.fromCompletionStage(activeChainTipFromBestBlock(block)));
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Convert best {@link Block} to active {@link ChainTip}. If BIP34 is activated this
113     * is purely computational, otherwise I/O is required to fetch the {@code ChainTip}
114     *
115     * @param block Input best block
116     * @return active ChainTip assuming parameter block is the "best block"
117     */
118    private CompletableFuture<ChainTip> activeChainTipFromBestBlock(Block block) {
119        int height = BlockUtil.blockHeightFromCoinbase(block);
120        if (height != -1) {
121            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(ChainTip.ofActive(height, block.getHash()));
122        } else {
123            return client.getChainTipsAsync()
124                    .thenApply(ChainTip::findActiveChainTipOrElseThrow);
125        }
126    }
127
128    // For setting breakpoints
129    void onNextChainTip(ChainTip tip) {
130        flowableChainTip.onNext(tip);
131    }
132}
